item.title: Why every Software Engineer should read Designing Data-Intensive Applications
item.description: Picking up this book was one of the best decisions I made for my fledgling software engineering career. Its insights enabled me to make well-reasoned software design decisions, and confidently communicate them, in spite of my relative professional inexperience. Given how helpful it has been, I’m here today to share more about the impression it has left on me, and convince you that it is a must-read if you are a software engineer.

item.title: Integrating PostHog product analytics with Docusaurus v2 on GitHub Pages
item.description: I integrated PostHog analytics into this website today. I decided to do so after reading Gergely Orosz's Stats page on his blog The Pragmatic Engineer. He had installed Plausible analytics and made his analytics dashboard public. I thought that was cool and wanted to do the same.

item.title: GitHub Action for Docusaurus
item.description: I got tired of deploying my Docusaurus website to GitHub Pages manually, and decided to do something about it using GitHub Action.

item.title: STACK 2020 Developers Conference
item.description: STACK 2020 Developers Conference is GovTech’s flagship conference and the largest government-led developers event in Singapore that connects government, industry and the tech community.
